data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 971 believers in Longnan to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Longnan, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 971 believers in Longnan, Gansu, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Longnan. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 971 believers in Longnan, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tibetan, Zhugqu people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Longnan, Gansu, China. Please, stir the 971 believers here to pray for awakening.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Longnan to agree with you and with one another.

data.section_summary:
the county of Longnan, Gansu, China has a population of 12,800.

We estimate Longnan has 971 people who might know Jesus, 207 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,622 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Longnan, Gansu, China today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
